verses.verse: To the chief Musician<WH5329> upon Gittith<WH1665>, A Psalm<WH4210> of David<WH1732>. O LORD<WH3068> our Lord<WH113>, how excellent<WH117> is thy name<WH8034> in all the earth<WH776>! who hast set<WH5414> thy glory<WH1935> above the heavens<WH8064>.

Out of the mouth<WH6310> of babes<WH5768> and sucklings<WH3243> hast thou ordained<WH3245> strength<WH5797> because of thine enemies<WH6887>, that thou mightest still<WH7673> the enemy<WH341> and the avenger<WH5358>. ordained: Heb. founded
When I consider<WH7200> thy heavens<WH8064>, the work<WH4639> of thy fingers<WH676>, the moon<WH3394> and the stars<WH3556>, which thou hast ordained<WH3559>;
What is man<WH582>, that thou art mindful<WH2142> of him? and the son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, that thou visitest<WH6485> him?
For thou hast made him a little<WH4592> lower<WH2637> than the angels<WH430>, and hast crowned<WH5849> him with glory<WH3519> and honour<WH1926>.
Thou madest him to have dominion<WH4910> over the works<WH4639> of thy hands<WH3027>; thou hast put<WH7896> all things under his feet<WH7272>:
All sheep<WH6792> and oxen<WH504>, yea, and the beasts<WH929> of the field<WH7704>; All: Heb. Flocks and oxen all of them
The fowl<WH6833> of the air<WH8064>, and the fish<WH1709> of the sea<WH3220>, and whatsoever passeth through<WH5674> the paths<WH734> of the seas<WH3220>.
O LORD<WH3068> our Lord<WH113>, how excellent<WH117> is thy name<WH8034> in all the earth<WH776>!
